\section{Experience}

\affiliation[Technican Manager]
{Letou (\url{http://www.eee168.com/})}
{March 2010-Now}
\vskip .5em

Worked in the System team of Letou, a startup focusing on Android
based pad products. Worked on system softwares for a product using
Nvidia Tegra 2 platform.

\vskip .5em
\begin{compactitem} 

\item Kernel bring up in early development. Including LCD, touch
  panel, battery, wifi, g-sensor, HAL, etc.\par

\item Designed factory testing tool used in factory production
  testing. \par

\item Designed factory tool used in factory production. \par

\item Work closely as interface between vendor technical support and Letou System team. \par

\item Mentor junior team members with development process, tools, and code review.\par

\end{compactitem}

\affiliation[Staff Software Engineer]
            {Borqs (\url{http://www.borqs.com})}
            {November 2008-March 2010}

\vskip .5em

Worked in the Tools team of Borqs, a mobile device software company
that developped the OMS for China Mobile, a mobile platform derived
from Android.

\vskip .5em

\begin{compactitem}

        \item C/C++ \par
          
          \begin{compactitem}

          \item Developed Borqs Flashing Tool, which is used to flash
            the system image onto the device. \par
            
          \item Developed Borqs Engineering Tool, which serve as a
            testing environment for hardware and low level system
            software. \par

          \item Developed Borqs Engineering Tool Library, which
            enabled partners and customers to develop their own
            tools. \par

          \item Developed Borqs Service Tool for repair centers. \par

          \item Other misc tools including frame buffer capturing,
            serial port passthrough, etc. \par

          \end{compactitem}

        \item Python \& PyQt\par

          \begin{compactitem}
            
          \item Used Python \& PyQt to develop the GUI part in most of
            the projects I worked on. \par
            
          \end{compactitem}

      
\end{compactitem}
